description: Comprehensive software engineering education with focus on software development, algorithms, data structures, and system design. Completed various projects in web development, database design, and software architecture.
Professional certification in designing distributed systems on AWS. Covers advanced architectural patterns, security, and cost optimization strategies.

Comprehensive machine learning course covering supervised and unsupervised learning, neural networks, and deep learning applications.
